wikipedia_page.main:
Alfred Ernest Watkins (26 June 1878 – 7 December 1957) was a Welsh international footballer who played as an inside-forward.
Watkins played club football for Leicester Fosse, Aston Villa, Grimsby Town and Millwall Athletic. He was part of the Wales national football team between 1898 and 1904, playing 5 matches. He played his first match on 19 March 1898 against Scotland and his last match on 21  March 1904 against Ireland.His younger brother, Walter Watkins, also played professional football.
